mapper.select: SELECT t_device.id, t_device.device_name, t_device.description, t_device.appointment, t_device.create_date, t_device.last_update_date, t_device.visit_total, t_device.device_no, t_device.main_image_url, t_device.status, t_device.rich_content, t_device.total FROM t_category_device, t_device WHERE t_category_device.category_id=#{categoryId} AND t_category_device.device_id=t_device.id

SELECT device.id, device.category_id, device.device_name, device.description, device.appointment, device.visit_total, device.device_no, device.main_image_url, device.status, device.rich_content, tcatd.category_id As tcatd_category_id FROM t_device device LEFT JOIN t_category_device tcatd ON tcatd.device_id=device.id LEFT JOIN t_category tcat ON tcat.id=tcatd.category_id WHERE device.status='NORMAL' AND CONCAT_WS('',device_name,description) LIKE #{searchKey}
SELECT * from t_category WHERE status=#{status} AND id=#{loginCategoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order( id, user_id, order_status, message, device_name, create_date, device_id, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, 'APPOINTMENT', #{message}, #{deviceName}, NOW(), #(deviceId), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_device ,t_category_device WHERE t_device.`id` =t_category_device.`device_id` AND t_device.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_device SET visit_total=#{visitTotal} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_mall_img WHERE TYPE=0 AND device_id=#{deviceId}

SELECT main_image_url, t_device.id,t_device.`visit_total`,t_device.`device_name`,t_category.category_name,t_category.`id` as categoryId FROM t_device ,t_category_device,t_category WHERE t_device.`id`=t_category_device.device_id AND t_category_device.category_id=t_category.id AND t_category.id=#{loginCategoryId} ORDER BY t_device.visit_total DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT t_device.id AS id,t_device.`device_name` AS deviceName,t_device.`total` AS total ,t_category_device.`category_id` AS categoryId,t_category.`category_name` as cateName FROM t_device ,t_category_device ,t_category WHERE t_device.id=t_category_device.`device_id` AND t_category.`id`=t_category_device.`category_id` AND t_category_device.`category_id`=#{categoryId}

SELECT t_device.id AS id,t_device.`device_name` AS deviceName,t_device.`total` AS total ,t_category_device.`category_id` AS categoryId,t_category.`category_name` as cateName FROM t_device ,t_category_device ,t_category WHERE t_device.id=t_category_device.`device_id` AND t_category.`id`=t_category_device.`category_id` AND t_category_device.`category_id`=#{categoryId} and device_name=#{deviceName}

SELECT t_order_class.book AS book, t_order_class.`id` AS id , t_device.`device_name` AS deviceName, t_order_class.`appoint_time` AS appointTime, t_order_class.`day_time`, t_order_class.delete_id AS deleteId, t_student_info.`certificate_id` AS certificateId, t_student_info.id AS userId , t_student_info.`name` AS userName, t_student_info.`email` AS email , t_student_info.`sex` AS sex, t_student_info.`mobile` AS phone, t_student_info.`theclass` AS theClass, t_student_info.`grade` AS grade, t_category.`category_name` AS cateName, t_order_class.`authority`, t_category_device.`classroom_no` as classroom
FROM t_order_class,t_device ,t_student_info,t_category_device ,t_category WHERE t_order_class.`device_id`=t_device.`id` AND t_category_device.`device_id`=t_device.`id` AND t_category_device.`category_id`=t_category.`id` AND t_order_class.`user_id`=t_student_info.`id` AND t_category.`id`=#{categoryId} AND t_order_class.`device_id`=#{deviceId} and t_order_class.`authority`=3 order by t_order_class.`id` desc

SELECT t_order_class.book AS book, t_order_class.`id` AS id , t_device.`device_name` AS deviceName, t_order_class.`appoint_time` AS appointTime, t_order_class.`day_time`, t_order_class.delete_id AS deleteId, t_lab_teacher_manager.name AS NAME, t_lab_teacher_manager.title AS title , t_lab_teacher_manager.`office` AS office, t_category.`category_name` AS cateName, t_order_class.`authority`, t_category_device.`classroom_no` AS classroom
FROM t_order_class,t_device ,t_lab_teacher_manager,t_category_device ,t_category WHERE t_order_class.`device_id`=t_device.`id` AND t_category_device.`device_id`=t_device.`id` AND t_category_device.`category_id`=t_category.`id` AND t_order_class.`user_id`=t_lab_teacher_manager.`id` AND t_category.`id`=#{categoryId} AND t_order_class.`device_id`=#{deviceId} AND t_order_class.`authority`!=3 ORDER BY t_order_class.`id` DESC

SELECT main_image_url, t_device.id,t_device.`visit_total`,t_device.`device_name`,t_category.category_name,t_category.`id` as categoryId FROM t_device ,t_category_device,t_category WHERE t_device.`id`=t_category_device.device_id AND t_category_device.category_id=t_category.id AND t_category_device.`category_id`=#{categoryId} and t_device.id!=#{deviceId} limit 3
SELECT * FROM t_device ,t_category_device WHERE t_category_device.`device_id`=t_device.`id` AND category_id=#{loginCategoryId}
